articles.author: Robby Kalland
articles.title: 2025 Ryder Cup results, scores: Europe commands standings, mounts first Day 1 lead on U.S. soil in two decades - CBS Sports
articles.description: Jon Rahm, Tommy Fleetwood and Rory McIlroy led a thorough beatdown of Americans on Friday at Bethpage Black
articles.content: FARMINGDALE, N.Y. -- Wonder no longer whether Europe can win another Ryder Cup stateside; the visitors are firmly in the driver's seat at Bethpage Black with three sessions and 20 matches to play. Th… [+7774 chars]
